controllers

Class Broadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • hypeerweb.broadcast.BroadcastVisitor
      • controllers.Broadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor

    public class Broadcaster
extends BroadcastVisitor
    Broadcasts a message from the start node (the first node to receive this visitor) to all other nodes in the HyPeerWeb. Every time the message reaches node the indicated node and message are printed in the "TraceInformation" section of the GUI. 
                    Domain: None

      Broadcaster()
      The default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • createInitialParameters

        public static Parameters createInitialParameters(java.lang.String message)
        Creates the parameters needed to send the Broadcaster visitor to the first Node.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be broadcast to all node.
        Pre-condition:
        None
        Post-condition:
        result ≠ null AND result.contains(MESSAGE_KEY) AND result.get(MESSAGE_KEY) = message
